Title: Painting the Door
Plot:
Fuffa sees an opportunity for mischief and suggests to each of the Cloudbabies that the door of Cloudy House needs a new coat of paint. Each Cloudbaby resolves to paint the door in their favourite colour. None can understand why, when they have painted the door in their favourite colour, it isn't that colour when they return. Of course, another Cloudbaby has already painted over it.
When they finally realise what has gone on, they confront Fuffa, who simply says she didn't tell them to paint the
